text: Adelomyrmex boltoni is a kind of ant. It was first found on October 25, 1982 by F. Baud in Paraguay. It was described by Fernandez, F. in 2003.Fernandez, F., 2003, Revision of the myrmicine ants of the Adelomyrmex genus-group (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)., Zootaxa (361), pp. 1-52: 14-15 More data has been put out by Wild, A. L. in 2007.Wild, A. L., 2007, A catalogue of the ants of Paraguay (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)., Zootaxa (1622), pp. 1-55: 30 ==References== Category:Ants
title: Adelomyrmex boltoni
